Aug 19 ,2013
 09:30 AM
Please be advised that we are making improvements to our LTL Freight services, and therefore LTL Freight / pallet shipment processing is currently unavailable. We will assist all clients who need to ship LTL Freight during this period. Please contact our heroic support team at support@emergeit.com for further information.
